metadata.Title: CVE-2023-2166 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A null pointer dereference issue was found in can protocol in net/can/af_can.c in the Linux before Linux. ml_priv may not be initialized in the receive path of CAN frames. A local user could use this flaw to crash the system or potentially cause a denial of service.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-2166` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.13.0-16-generic - 4.13.0-16.19
linux-image-4.13.0-16-generic-lpae - 4.13.0-16.19
linux-image-4.13.0-16-lowlatency - 4.13.0-16.19
linux-image-extra-4.13.0-16-generic - 4.13.0-16.19
No subscription required

linux-image-4.15.0-1001-aws - 4.15.0-1001.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-1097-aws - 5.4.0-1097.105~18.04.1
No subscription required

No subscription required

No subscription required
